title: Kindred Jewelry
body:
I have been making some Kindred themed peaces lately. I fell in love with the duality and how the copper and silver contrast. Hope you like them!

https://66.media.tumblr.com/d82eb31b88d15f2cea60975557367b11/tumblr_o6qktwC4qM1sj4s9no1_540.jpg

https://67.media.tumblr.com/9e45253cbb14a1e04eddb7df682d99e1/tumblr_o6qktwC4qM1sj4s9no2_540.jpg

https://65.media.tumblr.com/2732c725672754eb05c5c224c411ea25/tumblr_o6qktwC4qM1sj4s9no4_540.jpg

https://66.media.tumblr.com/f1788c3894afc37c05bb4a12c83ecf90/tumblr_o6qktwC4qM1sj4s9no3_540.jpg

replies.body: Wow, people down vote this? Probably the same people who can't do the stuff you could do, making art and stuff. I love Kindred so I love this so much :D

> [{quoted}](name=AChanceOfReign,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mUVEKBMy,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-06T13:18:15.409+0000)
>
> Wow, people down vote this? Probably the same people who can't do the stuff you could do, making art and stuff. I love Kindred so I love this so much :D

Thank you! Kindred is my all time favorite champion. Their lore is awesome and I love dualities and Kindred is nothing but.

> [{quoted}](name=CitadelOfIce,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mUVEKBMy,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-07T05:04:54.824+0000)
>
> Thank you! Kindred is my all time favorite champion. Their lore is awesome and I love dualities and Kindred is nothing but.

Np, I love Kindred as well. The duet design feels awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=Lutzburg,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mUVEKBMy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-06T03:50:39.598+0000)
>
> This is really neat!

Thank you. :)
